GameData.LocalizedText:
Eldridge
The protagonist of the mysterious "Operation Rainbow" story, Eldridge, you are ready to show your legend to the world. Your army will mysteriously travel from city to city and inflict thunderous fury on your enemies. You will utilize the ingenuity of your people to build the Eagle Union into a great nation. When the Eagle Union flourishes, you will become the most legendary protagonist of many legends.
Emit sparks. Can't teleport...
Eldridge would capitalize on her advantage in Research Point and come out on top.
As the protagonist of the mysterious "Operation Rainbow", Eldridge has a unique advantage in terms of [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point: she can easily obtain [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point from [ICON_Science] Science, and has a higher cap on cost reductions. Early in the game, Eldridge can utilize the [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point gained from the [ICON_CITIZEN] People in the city and her own cost reduction to complete key Techolongies and Civics as quickly as possible. Later in the game, Eldridge can quickly establish the Eagle Union as a Science Victory by utilizing the large amount of [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point gained from [ICON_Science] Science and the low cost of [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point.
The USS Eldridge (DE-173) is a US Cannon class escort destroyer named in honor of Major John Eldridge (1903-1942), who died in action in the Solomon Islands. The Eldridge began construction on February 22, 1943, was launched on July 25, 1943, and officially entered service on August 27, 1943.
From January 4, 1944 to May 9, 1945, she carried out missions in the Mediterranean and successfully escorted Casablanca, Bizerte, and Oran on nine voyages.
On May 28, 1945, she left New York City to carry out escort missions in the Pacific region. Arrived in Okinawa on August 7th for local escort and patrol.
On June 17, 1946, she retired from the United States Navy. On January 15, 1951, the Greek Navy acquired the Eldridge through the "Mutual Defense Assistance Program" and renamed it the "HS Leon" (D54). Subsequently, she was mainly responsible for patrolling the Eastern Aegean Sea and training naval academies. On November 15, 1992, Eldridge retired from the Greek Navy and was subsequently sold for dismantling on November 11, 1999, ending his legendary life.
Operation Rainbow
Prefers civilizations adjacent to her or with high [ICON_Science] Science, and hates civilizations with low [ICON_Science] Science that are far away from her.
Eldridge likes civilizations with high Science.
You have high Science
Eldridge likes the civilizations adjacent to her
You are her neighbor
Eldridge hates civilizations that aren't neighbors and have low Science.
You are low Science and not her neighbor
Philadelphia Experiment
Earn [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point per turn equal to 20% of [ICON_Science] Science per turn rate. All units gain the "Operation Rainbow" and "Max Voltage" unit commands. +2 [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point for every [ICON_CITIZEN] population in the city. [ICON_ResearchPoint] Research Point cost -15% and +25% reduction cap.
Operation Rainbow
Transfer to any city.
Max Voltage
Limited to once per turn, damage all adjacent enemies by {1_num}.
{1_point : number +#.#;-#.#}% of damage
[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{1_point : number +#.#;-#.#}% from Combat
[NEWLINE]{1_point : number +#.#;-#.#} from Science per turn
[NEWLINE]{1_point : number +#.#;-#.#} from Population
[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]{1_percent : number +#.#;-#.#}% from Philadelphia Experiment
<!--同意宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，愿意和你做朋友……要睡一会儿吗？</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>呣……不要摇我……</Text> </Replace> <!--请求宣布友谊--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，想跟你做朋友呢……你，愿意吗？</Text> </Replace> <!--宣布友谊被接受--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯？这是拉菲心情好的表现喔……</Text> </Replace> <!--宣布友谊被拒绝--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲很可怕么？</Text> </Replace> <!--被宣战--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>自我限制解除……再次化身鬼神也无所谓的……</Text> </Replace> <!--宣战--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲决定对你宣战。嗯……拉菲决定对你宣战……嗯……</Text> </Replace> <!--接受代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>代表团……拉菲收到了哦……</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，要睡一会儿……</Text> </Replace> <!--派出代表团--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯……愿意接收拉菲的代表团么？</Text> </Replace> <!--被谴责--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，很，可，怕，么？</Text> </Replace> <!--谴责--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>逞英雄可没意思……（谴责你）</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>我是备受期待的本森级驱逐舰拉菲，在三次所罗门海战有着极为活跃的表现……你说战舰？那是什么？</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，邀请参观附近城市--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>愿意到访拉菲附近的城市么？</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，感谢玩家提供最近城市位置--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>呜……谢谢……</Text> </Replace> <!--初次见面，请求交换城市位置--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲想看看你的城市呢……拉菲的城市，也会给你看的……</Text> </Replace> <!--欢迎语？--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>要一起睡会儿么？</Text> </Replace> <!--示好--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯，拉菲喜欢你……</Text> </Replace> <!--敌视--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>Zzzzzzzzz……</Text> </Replace> <!--请求结盟--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，想跟你结盟呢……</Text> </Replace> <!--同意和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯……就这样吧……</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>这点程度和我当时可差远了……</Text> </Replace> <!--请求和平--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲想要和平……呼……拉菲，要睡一会儿……</Text> </Replace> <!--接受开放边界请求--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>开放边界？嗯……去吧……</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝开放边界请求--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲对开放边界不感兴趣……</Text> </Replace> <!--请求开放边界--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，想要通过你的边境呢……</Text> </Replace> <!--要求移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>浩浩荡荡的舰队……拉菲，能看见……</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_NEGATIVE_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲，需要这只军队呆在这儿……</Text> </Replace> <!--同意移开边境部队--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_AI_RESPONSE_POSITIVE_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲会移走军队的……嗯……</Text> </Replace> <!--经受不住时间考验--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲…还能战斗……</Text> </Replace> <!--同意交易--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>嗯……</Text> </Replace> <!--拒绝交易--> <Replace Tag="LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_ELDRIDGE_DE173_ANY" Language="en_US"> <Text>拉菲……不接受……</Text> </Replace>
